author: Special Correspondent
text:
The timings of schools have been changed in Puducherry and Karaikal regions from the academic year 2016-17 onwards.

Circular

In a circular, Director of School Education L. Kumar said the change would be effected in order to maintain uniformity in the timings of all schools in Puducherry and Karaikal regions from the coming academic year.

In urban schools the forenoon session will be from 9 a.m. to 12.25 p.m, lunch break from 12.25 p.m. to 2 p.m. and afternoon session from 2 p.m. to 4.15 p.m.

In rural schools the forenoon session will be from 9.30 a.m to 12.55 p.m., lunch break from 12.55 p.m. to 2 p.m. and the afternoon session will be from 2 p.m. to 4.15 p.m.
title: School timings changed
